main event: Three unidentified flying objects were sighted over Phoenix, Arizona on April 5, 1952.
interesting points: The objects were described as large, circular, and dull gray with no wings or fins., One object disappeared and reappeared, joining two others to form a V-formation., The speed of the objects was reported to be half the rate of a falling comet., Witnesses included four civilians, who provided consistent descriptions of the objects., Two F-86 jets landed at Luke AFB shortly after the sighting, but reported no strange objects in the area.
witness description: civilians residing in the Phoenix area
